name: J-Girl
description: The background of this game is set more than 200 years in the future, scientists will discover new energy -- crystal energy (abbreviated as 'J'), and use it to make fighting girl robot. The player as the male driver will drive the girl robot to fight.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200 Memory: 2 GB MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB MB available space Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB MB available space Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended
